articles.title: Biden, South Africa's Ramaphosa discuss impact of Ukraine crisis on food security -White House - Reuters.com
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden and South African President Ramaphosa in a phone call on Friday discussed the impact of the Ukraine crisis on commodity prices, supply chains and food security in Africa, the White House said in a statement.
